The loan she is asking for is to invest in repairs to her animals' corral and for investment in the sales of beauty products, and this will lead her to more income for sustaining her family, resulting in a better quality of life in her area.  The investment in her line of work will help her to have more options, as the market is very open for her business.  There are 5 people who work with the same business model, and the weekly sales to her customers are good for her because her income grows in a short time.

One of her principal goals is to gain more customers and make her sales 100%, for which success, she will need to have great strength and responsibility and work starting very early in the morning.

loans.use: to invest in repairs on her animals' corral and to invest in the sales of beauty products.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es: Luis con su anterior credikiva, compró bolsas plásticas, tubos de cartón, sacos, cabuya y papel celofán. Con esta inversión pudo aumentar el volumen de ventas y tenr un efectivo disponible para compras oportunas. En la actualidad está tan ntusiasmado que se ha acercado a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para acceder a un nuevo credikiva,  inversión con la que planea comrar empaques industriales y material reciclable para continuar fortaleciendo su negocio de reciclaje. Su mensaje a los finaciadores de Kiva es el siguiente: " Estoy my agradecido por el apoyo y espero que continuenayudando a fortalecer nuestro negocio. "
texts.en: Luis used his previous Kiva loan to buy plastic bags, cardboard tubes, sacks, twine, and cellophane paper. This investment allowed him to increase his sales and have cash available for timely purchases. His current enthusiasm brought him to Fundación Mario Santo Domingo in order to access a new Kiva loan. He plans to invest in the purchase of industrial packaging and recyclable material so that he can continue to strengthen his recycling business. His message to Kiva financers is the following: "I am very grateful for the support and I hope you will continue to help us strengthen our business."

loans.use: to buy industrial packaging and recyclable material.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: Carlos de 51 años, un hombre  casado y padre de 2 hijos en las edades de 10 y 15 años, es el propietario de un taller de ebanistería donde elabora todo tipo de muebles de madera. Su negocio tiene 32 años de existencia y es producto de la tradición familiar; el vende directamente y desarrolla   todo el proceso productivo desde la compra de materias primas, insumos  el diseño, corte preparación, ensamble de muebles, acabado y venta de los mismos. Sus ventas las realiza de contado en aserraderos de la ciudad principalmente; la clientela de Carlos está conformada por vecinos del sector y referidos que conocen la calidad del trabajo con que en su taller producen los diversos muebles de sala comedor, alcoba etc. Con su negocio Carlos sostiene su hogar y espera que todos sus esfuerzos se vean reflejado en lograr que sus hijos terminen estudios superiores y sean personas exitosas en lo que emprendan. En la actualidad Carlos está aplicando a un credikiva con el cual comprara materia primas como madera  y una maquina cateadora   la cual se utiliza para alisar el material abombado, cuarteado para dejarlo plano. Con esta inversión Carlos tendrá un proceso mas efectivo, fabricará nuevos diseños y sus acabados aumentarán la calidad, lo cual se constituye en el éxito de su credikiva.
texts.en:
Carlos is 51 years old, married, and the father of 2 children ages 10 and 15. He is the owner of a cabinetry shop where he makes all kinds of wooden furniture. His business is 32 years old and has been in his family all this time. He sells directly to customers, and is responsible for all steps of the process from the purchase of raw materials and other ingredients, to the design, to the cutting and preparation of the wood, to assembling the furniture, and ending in the sale of the furniture. He makes his sales mostly by cash in the city; Carlos' clients are mostly neighbors and people who have been referred to him who know he produces high quality furniture and a variety of products. 

With his business, Carlos sustains his home and hopes that with his efforts his children will be able to finish their studies and be successful in whatever they do. Currently, Carlos is applying for this loan in order to buy raw materials such as wood and a sawing machine that he will use to smooth the wood and make it flat. With this investment, Carlos will have a more effective process, will be able to produce new designs, and will be able to improve the quality of his furniture, all of which would make this loan a successful one.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as wood and sawing machine that he will use to smooth the wood and make it flat

loans.name: Nelva

texts.es:
La socia Nelva continua dedicandose al negocio de venta de artesania,la socia vende por el centro de la ciudad la socia es una persona alegre y responsable con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando por su familia,la socia vende lo que son chompas,polos,guantes,chuyos entre otros a sus clientes que le solicitan como turistas,la socia desea poder continuar trabajando para de esta manera poder seguir apoyando economicamente a su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de chompas de alpaca para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Nelva continues to work selling handicrafts in the center of the city. She is a very happy and responsible person with a great desire to continue working for her family. She sells sweaters, shirts, gloves, and hats amont other things, and her clients are mainly tourists. She would like to be able to continue working this way, in order to continue supporting her family economically. 

With this loan Nelva will buy alpaca sweaters for her business. She is very grateful for the loan provided, and she promises to repay all loan quotas on time.

loans.use: to buy alpaca sweaters for her business

loans.name: Omon

texts.ru:
Омон житель района Шахритус. Ему 37 лет. Он женат, имеет 5 детей. Жена Омона работает в школе. Омон имеет средне-специальное образование. Он более восьми лет работает медбратом.
Также Омон на протяжении 10 лет занимается животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду Омон на сегодняшний день имеет одну корову и быка. Семья Омона обеспечена молоком и молочными продуктами.
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Омон обратилась за кредитом в нашу организацию для закупа нескольких голов крупного рогатого скота. Доходы от кредита Омон будет вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие бизнеса (увеличения количества скота).
texts.en: Omon is a resident of the Shahrituz district.  He is 37 years old, married and has five children.  His wife works at a school.  Omon has a secondary-specialized education.  He has been working as a nurse for over eight years.  Omon has also been involved in animal husbandry for ten years.  Thanks to his hard work, today he has one cow and a bull.  Omon's family is provided with milk and dairy products.  In order to further develop his business, Omon requested a loan from our organization to purchase several heads of cattle.  He will invest the earnings from the loan into a continued development of his business (increasing livestock quantities).

loans.use: to buy a cow, bulls and calves

loans.name: Chorikul

texts.ru:
Чорикул житель района Шахритус. Ему 51 год. Он вдовец. У него четверо детей. Его дети работает в городе Душанбе. Сам Чорикул предоставляет услугу такси на арендованном автомобиле. В этой области Чорикул уже четыре года. 
Чорикул просит кредит для ремонта автомобиля.
texts.en: Chorikul is a resident of the Shahrituz district.  He is 51 years old, a widower and has four children, all of whom work in the city of Dushanbe.  Chorikul provides a taxi service on a leased car.  He has been in this business for four years.  Chorikul is requesting this loan to repair his car.

loans.use: to repair his car

loans.name: Mamur

texts.ru:
Мамур проживает в городе Истаравшан. Ему 52 года. Мамур живет с женой. Жена Мамура домохозяйка. Его старший сын занимается бизнесом а младший работает в городе Худжанд.
Мамур имеет высшее образование. По профессии он агроном. Мамур более десяти лет работает в этой области. Кроме того он занимается посевом сельскохозяйственных культур. 
При доме Мамур имеет большой участок земли, где выращивает овощи. В этой области Мамур имеет богатый опыт. Он берет кредит для закупа минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Mamur lives in the city of Istaravshan.  He is 52 years old and lives with his wife, who is a homemaker.  His oldest son is involved in a business, and the youngest works in the city of Khujand.  Mamur has a higher education.  He is an agronomist.  Mamur has been working in this field for over ten years.  Besides this work, he is involved in sowing agricultural crops.  He has a large plot of land by his house, where he grows vegetables.  Mamur has a rich experience in this field.  He is requesting this loan to purchase mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is a 31 year-old businesswoman.  She is married to Jackson, who is a businessman. They are blessed with two children.  She has been running a spare parts shop for the past four years, with a monthly income of KES.10,000, which she uses to support her family. 

She is applying for her second loan from KADET LTD. after repaying the previous loan successfully. Emma will use the loan to buy more spare parts for sale. With the anticipated profit from the business she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to expand the business and improve the living standard of her family.

loans.use: to buy more spare parts for sale.

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is 64 years old, married, and with five children. He sells shoes to earn a living. He has engaged in this business for four years. Besides, he also does horticultural farming to generate extra income. He previously acquired a loan which helped him to grow his business. He also knows how to manage his business because he has been trained in business management. He dreams of expanding his business in the future. He needs a loan of 40,000 KES to buy more shoes for resale.

loans.use: To buy more shoes

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia is married with two children. Alicia is 51 years old and lives in Poblacion, Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay.

Alicia sells dresses to earn a living and has had this business for 15 years. Each month, she earns 5000 PHP doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 6500 PHP to purchase more dresses for her clothing business.

Alicia is a new member of PMPC. In the future, Alicia hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more dresses for her clothing business

loans.name: Margret

texts.en:
Margret is 27 years old, married and blessed with two children. She has been running a retail shop for the last five years, earning a monthly income of 25,000 KES. 

Margret has applied for a loan of 50,000 KES from KADET LTD. She plans to add more stock of wheat flour, cooking fat, and salt for sale.

The anticipated profits will be ploughed back into the business for expansion. Her dream for the future is to be successful in life.

loans.use: to add more stock of wheat flour, cooking fat, and salt for sale.

loans.name: Divina

texts.en:
Divina is married with two children. She is 37 years old and lives in Poblacion, Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay.

Divina owns a general store business to earn a living and has had this business for fifteen years. Each month, she earns 8,000 PHP doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 6,500 PHP to purchase more stock for her general store.

Divina is a new member of PMPC. In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is 39 years old. He is married with two children. He operates a quarry and has been in the business for the past 11 years.

This is his second loan in KADET LTD. He repaid his previous loan well and in good time. He was introduced to KADET LTD by a field officer. He will use the loan amount to purchase a dairy cow.

He hopes to diversify his business and become a dairy farmer.

loans.use: to purchase a  dairy cow

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is 31 years old, married and with two children. He operates a retail shop to earn a living. Besides that, he is also employed. He has been in the business for five years. He previously acquired a loan from Faulu Kenya which helped him to grow his business. He also knows how to save because he has been trained in financial management. He dreams of operating a wholesale business in the future. He needs a loan of 80,000 KES to buy cooking oil, bread and maize flour.

loans.use: To buy cooking oil, bread and maize flour.

loans.name: Jamila

texts.en:
Jamila  is married with four children and all her children go to school.  She has a business selling used shoes. She has applied for a loan of 700,000 Uganda shillings from MCDT-SACCO to buy more   bales of used shoes.  She has been in this business for 9 years and doesn’t take care of additional family members.  She works at the market and sells to all categories of people.  

Jamila's major business challenges include seasonality and defaulters. She is aspiring of becoming a wholesaler and also to start importing used shoes. She resides in her own house but the family has no access   to electricity or piped water.  Her monthly expenses include school fees and feeding the family.

loans.use: To buy more bales of used shoes

loans.name: Asha

texts.en: Asha is 53 years old. She is a merchant who sells khangas. With these, she helps her customers present themselves well and she generates income to support her home. She has regular customers to whom she sells mostly on credit. Wherever Asha is, she identifies potential customers who will eventually buy from her. She is aware of opportunities and always taking advantage of them. Her goal for the future is to expand the business and venture into new businesses. Her biggest challenge in is obtaining resources to respond to her growing clientele quickly. She has to wait to get her money from her accounts receivable to be able to be effective. While she works hard and generates the main income for her home, she maintains a good profit margin. Right now, she is applying for a loan in the amount of Ksh 20,000. With it, she will buy more bundles of khangas for sale. This way, she will respond quickly to the customers who have made their orders and are expecting Asha to respond promptly.

loans.use: buy more bundles of khangas for sale.

loans.name: Melodia

texts.en:
Melodia is married with 4 children. She is 53 years old and lives in Poblacion Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay.

Melodia sells snack foods to earn a living; she has had this business for 20 years. She has requested a loan of 6,500 PHP to purchase more snacks for her snack vending business.

Melodia is a new member of PMPC. In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more snacks for her snack vending business

loans.name: Abbot

texts.en: Abbot is 25 years old and married. He sells clothes to earn a living, in a busy environment with reliable customers. He has been in the business for three years. His business has grown since he became a client of Faulu Kenya, because he has been trained in business management. Abbot dreams of expanding his business in the future. He needs a loan of 50,000 KES to buy women's and children's clothes for resale.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Alcides

texts.es:
El Sr. Alcides tiene 28 años, esta acompañado con la Sra. Sandra de 24 años de edad, ellos tienen un hijo, por quien luchan siempre con toda su fuerza.
Don Alcides empezó como carpintero, hace más de cinco años,  desde el año: 2.007. Él comenzó como aprendiz en una carpintería ajena, durante mucho tiempo estuvo trabajando de esa manera. Hasta que con la ayuda de su padre y su dinero que junto pudo salir adelante.
El solicita le crédito para la compra de maderas e insumos que desea utilizar para poder cumplir con los pedidos que tiene de sus clientes. Agradece por la ayuda que está recibiendo, pues le será muy provechoso.
texts.en:
Alcides is 28 years old and his companion is Sandra, aged 24, and they have one child, for whom he always fights with all his strength.

Alcides began working as a carpenter more than five years ago, in 2007.  He began his work as an apprentice carpenter in someone else's workshop, and for a long time he was working in this way.  Finally, with the help of his father and the money they got together, he was able to move forward.

The loan he is asking is for buying wood and materials that he wants to use to finish the requests he has from his customers.  He is thankful for the help he is being given, since it will be very beneficial.

loans.use: to buy wood and supplies.

loans.name: Gaby Gabriel

texts.es:
Gaby Gabriel tiene 24 años de edad, conviviente y con 2 hijos como carga familiar. Vive en casa propia, la cual está ubicada en  el Distrito de Tambogrande al norte del  Peru; ellos viven en la parte rural  de este distrito. El es uan persona que tiene mucha energia y ganas de trabajar para sacar a su familia adelante.
La actividad que desarrolla el titular es la agricultura, cuenta con 2 has de terreno agricola sembrado de limon que cosecha semanalmente cliente cuenta con mas de 6 años de experiencia en el manejo de sus negocios, existiendo buena relación familiar para seguir creciendo en su negocio. Por esto mismo, ha identificado que este es un buen momento para consolidar su rubro. Con este fin, ha solicitado un credito de 1500 soles. El destino del crédito será la compra de fertilizantes para cultivo de limón, esta inversión le permitirá seguir creciendo en su negocio y así mejorar su calidad de vida, cliente firma con su madre como aval.
texts.en:
Gaby Gabriel is 24 years old, partnered, and has two children in his care.  He lives in a house he owns, which is located in the district of Tambogrande in the north of Peru; they live in the rural part of this district.  He is a person with a lot of energy and really motivated to work to help his family get ahead.

The business he is developing is agriculture, and he has two hectares of cultivated land, where he has planted limes, which he harvests weekly.  He has over six years of experience in running his businesses, and has a good relationship with his family, which helps him continue to grow his business.  For this reason, he has identified this moment as a good time to consolidate his business model.  With this end, he is asking for a loan of 1,500 Soles.  The credit will be destined to buy fertilizers for the cultivation of his limes, and this investment will permit him to continue growing his business and thus improve his quality of life.  He is signing with his mother as a reference.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for growing limes.

loans.name: Marcela Liliana

texts.es: Marcela de 33 años, se dedica al comercio de productos cosméticos mediante guidas especializadas, desde hace 9 años cuando empezó vendiendo pocas mercancías, para obtener ingresos  que respondieras a su sostenimiento. Desde al año 2005 inició su negocio de venta de productos de belleza  en la modalidad de crédito y de contado, entre una clientela que desde ese tiempo ha ido construyendo y que continua en un ascendente crecimiento. Sus principales clientes son mujeres aunque maneja también líneas de artículos que impactan al género masculino y algunos de ellos le compran. Marcela vende con una frecuencia diaria y durante 8 horas en las cuales permanece en contacto con su clientela. Mientras sus   compras las realiza mensualmente en laboratorios que ofrecen sus productos mediante catálogos, que ella  utiliza para promocionar la oferta del mes. Su meta mas adelante es tener una boutique adecuando una habitación en su vivienda donde logre tener inventarios a precios muy económicos y se incrementen sus ventas. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, con el cual comprará productos de aseo personal, protectores para la piel, cosméticos, cremas limpiadoras, shampoo etc. aprovechando que por sus compras están ofreciendo descuentos especiales y que su clientela se siente muy agradecida cuando ella le propone los mejores precios del mercado y esto es justamente lo que hace de credikiva una inversión exitosa..
texts.en:
Marcela is 33 years old, and makes a living selling cosmetics. She started her business nine years ago, and began by selling small quantities of merchandise in order to support her family. She started her beauty business in 2005 selling products on credit and in cash to an increasing customer base. The majority of her clients are women, though she also sells products for men. Marcela works 8 hours every day, and is in constant contact with her clients.

Marcela buys her products monthly from catalogs and distributors, and she uses the catalogs to promote the products as well. Her goal is to open her own boutique in a room of her house where she can sell products at affordable prices and increase her sales. She plans to use the support from this loan to purchase additional products to further stock her business, such as: personal hygiene products, skincare products, cosmetics, cleansing creams, shampoo, etc. As she makes bulk purchases, she is able to receive discounts and pass those lower prices on to her customers. This ideal exchange is exactly what a Kiva loan promotes, a successful investment.

loans.use: to purchase personal hygiene products, skincare products, cosmetics, cleansing creams and shampoo.

loans.name: Humberto Alfonso

texts.es: Humberto con su compra de 35 galones de lubricantes de diferentes marcas, le fue muy bien, porque aumentó sus ventas, hoy  su negocio goza de una buena clientela y esto fue gracias a su credikiva, con el cual se encuentra muy entusiasmado, por eso está aplicando a un nuevo financiamiento,   el cual invertirá en repuestos para motocicletas y mas lubricante, pues es un producto que rota rápidamente, porque está comprando en mayor volumen y esto hace que pueda ofrecer mejores precios a su clientela. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: “Estoy muy agradecido… que Dios los bendiga , gracias a ustedes he logrado mejorar mi negocio espero sigan confiando en mi y me apoyen nuevamente. “
texts.en: Humberto was very successful with his purchase of 35 gallons of different brands of lubricants, as he was able to increase his sales. Today his business benefits from good clientele, as a direct result of his previous Kiva loan, and he is therefore applying for a new loan at this time. He plans to invest the new loan in motorcycle parts and more lubricant, as it is a product with high rotation since it is usually purchased in high volumes so he can offer his clients better prices. His message to Kiva lenders is the following: "I am very grateful...may God bless you, thanks to all of you I have been able to improve my business and I hope that you will continue believing in me in and support me again."

loans.use: to invest in motorcycle parts and lubricants

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “INTI QUILLA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia continua con su negocio de venta de artesanía, la socia vende por el centro de la ciudad su mercaderia a sus clientes que mas le solicitan como turistas,la socia vende lo que son chompas,chuyos,guantes,polos entre otros,la socia desea poder continuar trabajando por su familia y de esta manera seguir apoyando economicamente a su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de chompas de alpaca.
                                                                                                                             
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the communal bank "INTI QUILLA." The bank is located in the district of Cusco, in the province and department of Cusco. 

This borrower continues with her business selling handicrafts, and she sells them in the center of the city mainly to tourists. She sells sweaters, hats, gloves, and shirts among other things. She would like to continue working for her family, in order to support them economically. 

She is asking for this loan to buy alpaca sweaters. She is very happy for this loan and promises to repay all loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy alpaca sweaters

loans.name: Mireya

texts.es:
Ella nos a pedido ayuda en varias ocasiones y  ha realizado varios mejoramientos a su domicilio como son el arreglo del baño, la chimenea en el patio, enjarre y pintura, pisos de cerámica en 3 cuartos y ahora desea arreglar la fachada de su casa, cambiar una puerta y terminar de poner el piso cerámico en la entrada.  
L a señora Mireya trabaja para la secretaria de seguridad publica desde hace mas de 10 años así como su esposo.  Ya no tiene hijos que dependan de ella.  Desea seguir realizando mejoras a su domicilio y a otra casa de su propiedad para rentarla y tener otro ingreso seguro y así poder solventar sus gastos.
texts.en:
She has requested our help on various other occasions and has made several improvements to her home, such as fixing the bathroom, the chimney in the patio, stucco and painting, ceramic tile floors in 3 rooms.  She now wishes to fix the facade of her house, change a door and finish putting down ceramic tile flooring at the entrance.
Mrs. Mireya and her husband have been working for the secretary of public security for 10 years.  She no longer has children that depend on her.  She wishes to make improvements at her residence and another house that she owns to be able to rent it and have another source of income which will help her cover her expenses.

loans.use: to change a door and finish puttind down ceramic tile flooring in the entrance of her home.

loans.name: George

texts.en: George sells fish to earn a living. He previously acquired a loan of 50,000 KES from Faulu Kenya which helped him to add stock of fish to his business. He has also become economically empowered because he has been trained in financial management. He dreams of expanding his business and specializing in fish supplies in the future. He needs a loan of 80,000 KES to add stock of fish.

loans.use: To add stock of fish

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is a 44-year-old business lady; she is married to Fredrick who is a businessman. They are blessed with four children. She has been running a retail shop for the past 12 years with the monthly income of KES 5,000 which she uses to support her family. 

She is applying for her second loan from KADET LTD, after repaying the previous loan successfully. Beatrice will use the loan to restock her shop with sugar, rice and cooking oil. 

With the anticipated profit from the business she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to open a wholesale shop and improve the living standard of her family.

loans.use: To buy sugar, rice and cooking oil.

loans.name: Ngalla

texts.en: Ngalaa is a 23 year-old married man. He has 4 children whose ages range from one to nine years. He describes himself to be an honest man. He operates a retail store where he sells clothes and bags. He has been involved in this business for four year. His business is located at a viable business area and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge to be frequent disturbance by city council authorities. He will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more clothes and bags to resell. His business goal is to run a boutique within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will improve the living standard of his family .

loans.use: to expand store inventory

loans.name: Edith

texts.en: Edith is 40 years old.  She is married and has three children. She does dairy farming to earn a living. She has been in the business for three years and has one employee. Additionally, she also runs a taxi transport business to generate extra income. She had previously acquired a loan from Faulu Kenya which helped her to grow her business and educate her children with the income she generated. She dreams of expanding her business and employing more people in the future. She needs a loan of 100,000KES to buy more cows.

loans.use: To buy more cows

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is a hardworking businessman who runs a motorcycle transport business to earn a living. He runs his business in a good environment with reliable customers. He has been in the business for two years. He also does poultry farming to generate extra income. 

He has previously acquired a loan from Faulu Kenya, which helped him to grow his business. He needs a loan of 40,000 KES to buy a motorcycle for his transport business.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Junice

texts.en:
Junice is 44 years old, married and has two children. For the past seven years, she has earned a living selling cereals. She earns a monthly income of 3,000 KES. 

She has applied for her first of loan 15,000 KES from KADET Ltd, with which she plans to purchase more stock of maize and beans.

She will invest the anticipated profits back into her business. Her dream for the future is to have a happy family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of beans and maize.

loans.name: Verginia

texts.en:
Verginia is married with three children. She is 48 years old and lives in Poblacion Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay.

Verginia runs a general store to earn a living and has had this business for 20 years. Each month, she earns 6,000 PHP doing this type of work. She has requested a loan for 6,500 PHP to purchase more stock for her general store.

Verginia is a new member of PMPC. In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store

loans.name: Rebeka

texts.en:
Rebeka is 39 years old, married and has four children who are in school. She operates a grocery store to earn a living. She has been in the business since 2004 and has two employees. She also runs a transport business to generate extra income. 

She has previously acquired a loan from Faulu Kenya, which helped her to grow her business. She dreams of expanding her business in the future. She needs a loan of 100,000 KES to buy potatoes, tomatoes and onions.

loans.use: To buy potatoes, tomatoes and onions

loans.name: Gertrude's Group

texts.fr: Gertrude est la responsable d'un groupe de deux personnes en caution solidaire. Agée de 44 ans, Gertrude est mariée et mère de cinq enfants dont trois vont encore à l'école. Elle a une domestique à charge et vend  des liqueurs, des boîtes de conserve, des macaronies et de l'huile depuis plusieurs années. Elle se ravitaille dans l'un des marchés de la place. Soucieuse d'accroitre son chiffre d'affaire et de combler les attentes de ses clients, elle a fait recours au micro crédit de Finadev afin de maximiser son revenu supplémentaire et de participer à la scolarisation des enfants. Elle souhaiterait agrandir son activité et s'abonner à la source d'eau potable du Bénin. Gertrude se retrouve à gauche dans la photo.
texts.en: Gertrude is the leader of a group of two who are taking out a joint loan.   At age 44, she is married and the mother of five children, three of whom still attend school.   She has one domestic helper in her care and she has been selling liquor, canned goods, pasta and oil for several years.  She gets her supplies in one of the markets in her area.   In the interest of increasing her turnover and to meet the demands of her customers, she has applied for a micro loan from Finadev in order to maximize her supplemental income and to contribute to the education of her children.  She would like to grow her business and to have access to drinking water in Bénin.  Gertrude is to the left in the photo.

loans.use: to buy one case of canned goods, one case of liquor, and 10 packs of pasta.

loans.name: Luzmila

texts.es: Luzmila está muy contenta, porque compró refrescos, dulcería, artículos de aseo y víveres con los cuales surtió su tienda y generó un mayor volumen en sus ventas y esto fue gracias a su credikiva. Su decisión es continuar creciendo y por eso acude a un nuevo financiamiento con el cual comprara víveres en mayor volumen, refrescos y enlatados; su inversión será exitosa porque lo hace poco a poco, comprando productos que se venden frecuentemente, mantiene su negocio cada vez mas surtido y a su clientela le da la sensación de encontrar todo lo que necesitan y esto es un buen punto. En su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva, envía su agradecimiento por el apoyo brindado, pues ha logrado darle forma a su negocio, que cada día exhibe mayor diversidad de productos y espera de sus financiadores la sigan apoyandola.
texts.en:
Luzmila is very happy, because as a result of her previous Kiva Loan she bought drinks, sweets, cleaning products and food items with which she was able to stock her store and generate a larger volume of sales. She has decided to continue growing her store and as a result is soliciting a new loan with which she will buy greater quantities of food, drinks, and canned goods. Her investment will be successful because she will buy these goods little by little, buying products that are sold frequently, in order to maintain her business well stocked so her clients can always find what they are looking for. 

In her message to Kiva lenders, she sends her gratitude for the support provided, as they have enabled her to form her business, which every day exhibits a greater variety of products. She hopes that her lenders will continue supporting her.

loans.use: to buy large quantities of food, drinks, and canned goods

loans.name: Luz Divina Group

texts.es: El banco comunal Luz Diviana esta conformado por 8 intregrantes los cuales son:   Emelina, Maria Ines, Maria Mercedes, Oscar Danilo, Marcia Ramona, Angela Benita, Liliana Amparo, Nubia,  Nubia es la cordinadora del banco comunal la cual tiene por actividad economica una pulperia ubicada en su casa de habitacion el financiamiento lo quiere para invertir en compra de consumo diario como: arroz, frijoles, azucar, aceite, tiste, pan, leche, gaseosas, pastas, condimentos, hielos, entre otros.
texts.en:
The community bank Luz Divina (Divine Light) is made up of 8 members: Emelina, Maria Ines, Maria Mercedes, Oscar Danilo, Marcia Ramona, Angela Benita, Liliana Amparo and Nubia. Nubia is the group coordinator, and operates a convenience store located in a room of her house. 

She plans to invest the support from this loan in the purchase of staple products for resale in her store, such as: rice, beans, sugar, oil, bread, milk, sodas, pastas, condiments, ice and other products.

loans.use: to purchase rice, beans, sugar, oil, bread, milk, sodas, pastas, condiments, ice and other products.

loans.name: Afuwa

texts.en:
Afuwa is married with five children and all her children go to school. She takes care of additional family members (father and brother).

She has a business of selling charcoal. She has been in this business for 10 years. She works six days a week selling charcoal at home and sells to all categories of people through retail. She has applied for a loan of 600,000 Uganda shillings from MCDT SACCO to buy more bags of charcoal. 

Her major business challenges include seasonality and thieves. She aspires to see her business grow big so that she can sell by wholesale only. 

She resides in her own home and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses includes school fees and feeding the family.

loans.use: To buy more bags of charcoal

loans.name: Nicolle Josette

texts.fr: Nicolle est une femme mariée de 49 ans mère de 4 enfants dont l'age varie entre 12 et 23 ans et 3 de ses enfants vont encore à l'école. Elle fait la vente en  détail des vivres frais(  tomate,oignons et poivrons) en fonction des saisons dans un marché de la place depuis 15 ans. Elle a un bonne connaissance des fournisseurs, et surtout de sa clientèle qu'elle a acquise au fil du temps grâce à son expérience dans ce domaine. Elle souhaiterai acheter des les cajots de tomate, un sac d’oignons les cajots de poivrons  pour avoir un bon stocks ce qui permettra de mieux satisfaire la demande constante de sa clientèle et d'éviter les ruptures de stocks. Elle économisera son bénéfice pour non seulement agrandir son activité mais aussi subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Nicolle is a married woman of 49, mother of four children whose ages range from 12 to 23 years of age. Three of the children attend school. For 15 years, she has been retailing foodstuffs (tomatoes, onions, and peppers) according to the season, in a local market. She knows her suppliers well and especially her clientele which she has acquired over the years thanks to her experience in this business. 

Nicolle would like to buy crates of tomatoes, a sack of onions, and crates of peppers.  so as to have a good stock that will allow her to respond to the constant demand of her clientele and to avoid running out of something. She will save her profit not only to grow her business, but also to support her family.

loans.use: to buy crates of tomatoes, a sack of onions, and crates of peppers.

loans.name: Adriana

texts.es:
La señora Adriana esta solicitando un crédito para pagar las inscripciones de uno de hijos quien va a cursar sus estudios universitarios por lo cual la señora Adriana se encuentra muy orgullosa y no desea que por no tener el dinero suficiente su hijo no pueda seguir sus sueños y convertirse un profesionista.
Ella trabaja como empleada domestica  en Laredo Texas mientras que su esposo trabaja como transfer para una línea de transportes; ambos se esfuerzan todos los días para brindarles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Adriana is requesting a loan to pay tuition for one of her children, who is going to go to college. Adriana is very proud of her son, and she doesn't want the fact that they don't have enough money to stop him from following his dreams and becoming a professional.
She works as a domestic employee in Laredo, Texas, while her husband works as a transfer driver for a transportation company. They both strive every day to provide the best for their children.

loans.use: to pay for tuition.

loans.name: San Fernando Ii Group

texts.es: El banco comunal san fernando esta conformado por Maria Leonor, Elias, Maria, Modesta Aurora,Ivania del Socorro, Rosalina, Norma, Leonidas del Carmen, 	Zacarias del Socorro,  todos tiene actividad economica diferentes, Modesta Aurora es la cordinadora del banco la cual se encarga de la diciplina y cumplimento de pago de los miembros del banco, Modesta tiene por actividad economica la venta de pulperia ubicada en su casa de habitacion , el financiamiento lo quiere para comprar productos de consumo diario como: arroz, azucar, frijoles cosidos, tiste, cuajada, queso, pollo en piezas, refresco naturales aceite, jabon de lavar, jabon de traste, detergente entre otros.
texts.en: The community bank San Fermando is made up of Maria Leonor, Elias, Maria, Modesta Aurora,Ivania del Socorro, Rosalina, Norma, Leonidas del Carmen, Zacarias del Socorro.  They all have differing economic activities.  Modesta Aurora is the bank coordinator, she is in charge of the enforcement and fulfillment of the payments of the members of the community bank.  Modesta makes a living selling groceries from her house.  She is requesting the loan for the purchase of basic supplies such as rice, sugar, cooked beans, tiste (a local drink), cuajada and other cheese, chicken in pieces, natural drinks, oil, soap, dish soap, detergents and other items.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, cooked beans, tiste (a local drink), cuajada and other cheese, cut up chickens, natural drinks, oil, soap, dish soap, detergents and other items.

loans.name: Sutiava Group

texts.es: El banco comunal sutiava esta comformado por 11 intregrantes los cuales son: Barbara, Maria de la concepcion , Reyna Isabel, Elsa Patricia,Pabla del Socorro, Tomasa Claudina, Xiomara del Carmen, Fania Yudel, Ivania , Maribel Graciela, Martha Patricia. Las actividades de cada una son diferentes, Maria de la Concepcion es la cordinadora del banco la cual se encarga del cumplimiento de cada miembro del banco, Maria de la Concepcion tiene por venta de ropa usada la cual consisten en comprar pacas de ropa de niño adulto.
texts.en:
The community bank Sutiava is made up of 11 members: Barbara, Maria de la Concepcion, Reyna Isabel, Elsa Patricia, Pabla del Socorro, Tomasa Claudina, Xiomara del Carmen, Fanina Yudel, Ivania, Maribel Graciela and Martha Patricia.

Each of the group members dedicates their time and efforts to different trades. Maria de la Concepcion is the group coordinator, and is in charge of ensuring that each member fulfills their respective roles and duties. Maria operates a used clothing sales business, and plans to use the support from this loan to purchase bundles of clothing for children and adults in bulk.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of clothing for children and adults.

loans.name: Leziel

texts.en:
Leziel is 36 years old and lives in Butuay, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 3 children.
 
Leziel has a hog-fattening business and earns approximately PHP 3,000 each month from doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of PHP 14,900 to be use in purchasing a side car unit for her business.
 
Leziel has been a member of PMPC for 2 years. In the future, Leziel hopes to engage in other types of business.

loans.use: To purchase a side car unit for her business

loans.name: Rosaline Adjoia's Group

texts.fr: Il s'agit d'un groupe de deux personnes en caution solidaire. Hermignonne Hadegnon, la responsable, est âgée de 32 ans. Mariée et mère d'un enfant âgé de 9 ans et scolarisé dans une école de la ville, elle a encore une personne à charge. Couturière de profession, elle a un atelier où elle vend aussi des pagnes depuis  quelques années et s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés de la sous région. Expérimentée dans le commerce, elle a sollicité et a obtenu un financement à Finadev en vue de renforcer son activité et de maximiser son profit. L'intérêt tiré de ce financement lui permettra de participer à la scolarisation de ses enfants et de subvenir à ses besoins. Hadegnon Hermignonne se retrouve à gauche dans la photo.
texts.en: This is a solidarity group of two persons. Hermignonne Hadegnon, the leader, is 32. Married and the mother of a child of 9, attending a local school, she is responsible for one other person. As a trained seamstress, she has a workshop where she has also been selling lengths of African print cloth for several years, sourced from a regional market. Experienced in commerce, she has requested and obtained a loan from Finadev with the intention of bolstering her business and maximizing her profit. The profit from this loan will permit her to help pay school fees for her children and to support herself. Hadegnon Hermignonne is on the left in the photo.

loans.use: to buy 20 lengths of African print cloth of various sorts

loans.name: Wilson Antonio

texts.es: Wilson de 39 años es el propietario de una tienda de víveres, ranchos, refrescos y en general artículos de la canasta familiar, en un municipio del departamento de Atlántico muy cerca a la ciudad de Barranquilla.  Wilson  desde hace 6 meses inició su negocio de tienda, para que su esposa trabajara en esa actividad, pues él se dedica a la reparación y mantenimiento de artefactos eléctricos, oficio con el  que ha sostenido su hogar. Con este nuevo ingreso,  producto de su tienda, espera junto a su esposa apoyar aun más el bienestar de sus 4 hijos menores de 11 años, con quienes sueña ver  convertidos en profesionales exitosos. Sus principales clientes  son los vecinos del sector, especialmente las amas de casa, que diariamente encuentran en la tienda una oportunidad de comprar productos de la canasta familiar, en el peso y la medida que sus posibilidades económicas. La ventas las realiza de contado y sus compras las realiza en abastos y empresas de refrescos principalmente. Wilson no ha tenido experiencia crediticia y esta es una oportunidad para crear su reputación financiera, como su mejor carta de presentación. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva con el cual comprará víveres, ranchos, refrescos y bebidas, en mayor volumen, con los cuales ganará descuentos que trasladará a sus nuevas utilidades. Y justamente esto es lo que hace que su credikiva sea una inversión exitosa, además que con ella potencializa posibilidades de abrirse financieramente en el mercado para que su negocio crezca y se sostenga.
texts.en:
Wilson, 39, is the proprietor of a store selling food, supplies, drinks and general household articles. It is located in a town in the department of Atlántico very close to the city of Barranquilla.  He started the business 6 months ago so that his wife could work there since he repairs and maintains electrical appliances, a trade with which he has supported his family. With this new income from the store, he expects that he and his wife will be able to better insure the wellbeing of their 4 children, who are all under 11 years old and whom he dreams of seeing become successful professionals.

Wilson’s main customers are neighbors in the area, especially housewives who daily find in the store an opportunity to purchase household products in an amount that is within their economic means. The sales are by cash and purchases are basic provisions and from soft drink companies principally. 

Wilson had no credit history and this is an opportunity for him to establish his financial reputation as his best introduction. Currently he is applying for a Kiva loan with which he will buy supplies, food and soft drinks in greater volume so that he will get discounts that will translate into new profits. And that is exactly what will make his Kiva loan a successful investment.  Also, with this investment he will improve the financial possibilities of a successful introduction to the market so that his business will grow and be sustained

loans.use: to buy provisions, food and soft drinks in greater volume so that he can get discounts.

loans.name: Nuestros Lirios De Los Valles Group

texts.es: Banco comunal nuestro lirios de los valles, tiene por karen Rebeca, Virginia Gertrudis, Adilsa Ramona, Isaura del Carmen,Delma Auxiliadora, Mercedes, C arina Libette, Norma, Telma Vilma, Maria Auxiliadora, Fatima Adelina. Todos los intregrantes se caracterizan por ser responsables, trabajadores, buenas pagas, ya que todos cumplen en tiempo y forma, Maria Auxiliadora es la cordinadora del banco la cual se en carga del buen funcionamiento de los integrantes tiene por actividad economica la venta de mercaderia en general como: camisas, pantalones, vestidos, faldas, chinelas, zapatos, ropa interior, juego se toallas, juegos de sabanas, ropa de niño, entre otros.
texts.en:
The communal bank Nuestro Lirios de los Valles is made up of Karen Rebeca, Virginia Gertrudis, Adilsa Ramona, Isaura del Carmen, Delma Auxiliadora, Mercedes, Carina Libette, Norma, Telma Vilma, Maria Auxiliadora, Fatima Adelina. All of the members are responsible, hard working, and good at repayment, since they all make their payments on time. 

Maria Auxiliadora is the coordinator for the bank and is in charge of the operations of its members. Her economic activity is selling general merchandise like shirts, pants, dresses, skirts, slippers, shoes, underwear, towel sets, sheet sets, children's clothes, among other things.

loans.use: to buy shirts, pants, dresses, skirts, slippers, shoes, underwear, towel sets, sheet sets, children's clothes, among other things.

loans.name: Jehova Es Mi Pastor Group

texts.es: El banco comunal  jehova es mi pastor esta conformado por  13 intregrantes los cuales son : Lissett del socorro, Alejandra Catalina, Dora del Carmen, Audelis del Carmen, Aurelia Maria, Pascual Arnulfo, Maria Teresa, Maria Amparo, Vilma Isabel, Anielka Maria, Esperanza, Reyna Maria, Estela. Todos tiene actividad economica diferentes, en el caso de Audelis del Carmen es la cordinadora del banco la cual tiene por actividad economica una pulperia ubicada en su casa de habitacion la el financiamiento lo necesita para invertir en producto de consumo diario como: arroz, azucar, frijoles, fosforo, pollo en piezas, jugos, pan, huevos, cuajada, queso, arina, condimentos, sopa enlatadas, tiste, sebada, entre otros.
texts.en: The community bank "Jehova is my Shepherd" is made up of 13 members who are:  Lissett del Socorro, Alejandra Catalina, Dora del Carmen, Audelis del Carmen, Aurelia Maria, Pascual Arnulfo, Maria Teresa, Maria Amparo, Vilma Isabel, Anielka Maria, Esperanza, Reyna Maria, Estela.  They all perform different economic activities.  Audelis del Carmen is the coordinator of the group and has a grocery store located in her home.  She needs the loan to be able to invest in basic goods such as rice, sugar, beans, matches, chicken pieces, juices, bread, eggs,cuajada, cheese, flour, condiments, canned soup, tiste ( a local drink), cebada ( a barley drink), and other items.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, beans, matches, chicken pieces, juices, bread, eggs,cuajada, cheese, flour, condiments, canned soup, tiste ( a local drink), cebada ( a barley drink), and other items.

loans.name: Naira

texts.ru:
Наира занимается парикмахерской деятельностью, а также продажей различных  товаров в городе Капане на протяжении 7 лет. Наира арендует помещение салона, но  инвентарь салона является ее собственностью. Салон Наиры пользуется большой популярностью, так как Наира профессиональный парикмахер. 
Также в своем салоне Наира продает косметические средства, фены, средства для ухода за волосами и ногтями, и т.д.  Наире очень нравится ее бизнес и поэтому она работает без выходных. Благодаря своему бизнесу, она помогает своему мужу содержать их молодую семью. Муж Наиры работает таксистом, а дважды в месяц он закупает необходимые товары для салона Наиры из Еревана. Наире 37 лет и у нее двое маленьких сыновей: старшему 3 года, младшему год. 
Наире необходим кредит в размере 750.000 драм для покупки большого количества косметических средств, краски для волос, шампуней и диффузоров для своего бизнеса.
texts.en: Naira has been involved in a hair styling business and also in selling various goods in the city of Kapan for seven years.  She leases her salon space, but owns the inventory of the salon.  Naira's salon is very popular because she is a professional hair stylist.  She also sells cosmetics, hair dryers, hair and nail care products, etc., in her salon.  Naira likes her business very much, and this is why she works without days off.  Thanks to her business, she helps her husband to support their young family.  Naira's husband works as a taxi driver and buys necessary products for Naira's salon from Yerevan twice per month.  Naira is 37 years old and has two small sons: the oldest is three years old, and the youngest is one.  Naira needs a loan in the amount of 750,000 dram to purchase a large inventory of cosmetic products, hair color, shampoo and diffusers for her business.

loans.use: to purchase a large inventory of cosmetic products, hair color, shampoo and diffusers for her business

loans.name: Rosario

texts.en:
Rosario is married, with one child.  Rosario is 58 years old and lives in Antonino, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte.

Rosario sells cosmetics products to earn a living, and she has had this business for five years. Each month, she earns PHP 2,500 doing this work. 

She has requested a loan of PHP 8,000 to purchase more stocks for her cosmetics sales.

Rosario has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks for her cosmetics sales business.

location.town: Liloy - Antonino, Labason, Zamboanga Del Norte

loans.name: Martial

texts.fr: Martial est un homme de 34 ans marié père de 2 ans de 2 et 4 ans, l'un deux va déjà à l'école. Il es menuisier et a ouvert un atelier dans la capitale qu'il gère depuis 12 ans. Son savoir faire et son expérience lui ont permis d'agrandir et fidéliser sa clientèle au fil du temps. Mais le petit capital de Martial ne lui permet pas de fabriquer plusieurs meubles et de les exposer sur la dévanture de sa structure pour attirer la clientèle et pour vendre aussi. C'est pourceela qu'il sollicite ce crédit pour acheter les planches et tapisseries pour meubles. Le bénéfice que ça lui apportera l'aidera en partie à subvenir aux besoins de sa clientèle et le reste sera réinvesti dans son activité pour l'agrandir.
texts.en:
Martial is 34 years old, married, and the father of two children aged 2 and 4. One of his children already goes to school. 

He is a furniture maker and opened a studio in the capital that he's been running for 12 years. His know-how and experience have allowed him to grow a loyal customer base over time. 

With Martial's small amount of capital, he can't make a lot of furniture and display it in the front window of his studio to bring in clients and make sales. 

For this reason, he's asking for a loan to buy wood planks and fabric for furniture. Part of the profits that he earns will help him meet the needs of his family and the rest will be reinvested in the growth of his business.

loans.use: buy wood planks and fabric for furniture.

loans.name: Topister

texts.en:
Topister has a beauty salon in Nakuru town and has been in this business for the past 2 years. She is 23 years old and married to Denis.

This will be her first loan and she plans to use the amount to buy cosmetic products such as hair oil and shampoo for use in her business. She also plans to buy different types of body lotion and jelly to sell. With the anticipated income she plans to open a boutique for selling clothes.

In the future, Topister hopes to buy a plot of land and build a house, as well as own a big cosmetic shop in Nakuru town.

loans.use: to buy cosmetic products.

loans.name: Nyanduko

texts.en:
Nyanduko  is 40 years old and single. She describes herself to be a social and jovial woman.

She operates a retail store where she sells household items, such as salt, sugar, sweets, and snacks. She has been involved in this business for two years. Her business is located in a residential area, and her primary customers are local residents.  She describes her biggest business challenge to be inadequate capital for improving the business. 

She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more household items for her stock.  Her business goal is to run a wholesale shop within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will have expanded her business.

loans.use: to buy more household items to sell.

loans.name: Kristine

texts.en:
Kristine lives in Arevashat village with her husband, son, and daughter. She rents a booth in one of the markets in Yerevan town, where she sells  clothing. 

Kristine would like to increase the variety of clothing she stocks, for which she needs sufficient means. With the requested loan, Kristine plans to buy more clothing. 

Income from retail is important for Kristine to cover her family costs and put aside savings for future education of her children.

loans.use: to pay for clothing to sell at the market.

loans.name: Gerald

texts.en:
Gerald is 32 years old and married, with two children.  Both are in school. 

He runs a taxi transport business to earn a living. Besides that, he also does farming to generate extra income. Through Faulu Kenya, he has learned how to save because he has been trained in financial management. He dreams of operating a fleet of vehicle in the future. 

Gerald needs a loan of KES 100,000  to buy spare parts and repair his vehicle.

loans.use: To buy spare parts and repair his vehicle.

loans.name: Juan Adolfo

texts.es:
Juan tiene 42 anos VIVE JUNTO A SU CONYUGE  QUIEN  LO  APOYA Y QUIEN ADEMAS CUENTA CON NEGOCIO DE VENTAS DE PRODUCTOS DE BELLEZA. ENTRE LOS DOS SON MUY TRABAJADORES Y CON BUENAS REFERENCIAS Y ES FAMILIA UNIDA. VIVE EN UNA COMUNIDAD DEDICADA AL TRANSPORTE, COMERCIO, AGRICULTURA Y GANADERIA EN CAYALTI AL NORTE DEL PERU.
CLIENTE SE DEDICA AL SERVICIO DE TRANSPORTES, CON EL CUAL CUENTA CON 01 MOTOTAXI  , DESDE  HACE MÁS DE  03 AÑOS EN EL DISTRITO DE ZAÑA. ESTE SERVICIO AYUDA A FOMENTAR EL COMERCIO DE LA COUNDAD CON EL RESTO DE PUEBLOS CERCANOS DADO QUE EL TRANSPORTA PERSONAS Y MERCANCIA. PRECISMENTE CON EL PRÉSTAMO INVERTIRÁ EN EL MANTENIMIENTO DE SU UNIDAD Y ASI LOGRARÁ ATENDER LA DEMANDA INSATISFECHA EN EL LUGAR,  AMPLIARÁ SU CARTERA DE CLIENTES,CONTANDO CON CLIENTES NUEVOS E INGRESOS ADICIONALES A LA FAMILIA.
texts.en:
Juan is 42 years old.  He lives with his spouse who supports him and who also has a business selling beauty products.  Between the two they are hard workers with good references and they are a unified family. He lives in a community dedicated to the transport and trade of agriculture and livestock in Cayalti, Northern Peru.  

The client [Juan] is dedicated to transportation services, for which he has had a Motorized Taxi 01 for the last 3 years in the Zana district.  This service helps to promote trade between the community and the rest of the nearby towns with the transport of people and merchandise.  Specifically, with this loan he will invest in the maintenance of the his unit [motor-taxi] and in that way he will be able to address the unsatisfied demand in the area.  He will expand his portfolio of customers and be able to solidify new clients and additional income for the family.

loans.use: to invest in the maintenance of his motorized taxi.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is 48 years old and lives in Poblacion Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay. She is married with three children.

To earn a living, Helen owns a restaurant. She earns about 3,500 Philippines pesos (PHP) each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 3500 PHP to purchase more raw ingredients for her restaurant business.

Helen is a new member of PMPC. In the future, Helen would like to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more raw ingredients for her restaurant business.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is 43 years old. He is married to Eunice, and together they have three children. He is a farmer, and he has been in the business for the past 11 years.

This is his second loan from KADET LTD. He repaid his previous loan well and in good time.  He was introduced to KADET by a credit officer.  He will use this loan to purchase fertilizer and seedlings and also to pay laborers on his farm.

He hopes to purchase another piece of land so as to expand his farming.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and seedlings and pay laborers.

loans.name: Martha Lorena

texts.es: Martha Lorena de 32 años de edad, casada, 4 hijos esta emprendedora tiene por herramienta de trabajo la venta de mercaderia en general, desde hace dies años que se dedica a dicha actividad, la cual inicio por la necesidad de tener un ingresos para su familias, ya que los trabajos eran escasos, en la actualidad  Martha a crecido en su clientela gracias  a su buen servicio y responsabilidad con sus  clientes y el apoyo que Leon 2000 y el programa kiva le brindan con los financiamiento para sacar adelante su negocio, el fianciamiento lo esta solicitando para compra productos como: pantalones, camisas, toallas, juegos de sabanas, kimonas, pillamas, ropa  interior, short, camisolines, entre otros.
texts.en:
Martha Lorena, 32, married, 4 children, is a hardworking person. She has been selling general merchandise for ten years and started her business due to the need for an income for her family since jobs were scarce.

Currently Martha’s customer base has grown thanks to the good, responsible service she provides her clients and to the support she has received with funding from Leon 2000 and Kiva so that she can move her business forward. She is requesting funding now to purchase products such as pants, shirts, towels, sheet sets, kimonos, pajamas, underwear, shorts and camisoles among other items.

loans.use: to purchase pants, shirts, towels, sheet sets, kimonos, pajamas, underwear, shorts and camisoles, among other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase raw materials and supplies to repair and rebuild pool tables.

loans.name: María Teresa

texts.es:
María Teresa
San Carlos
2012-162

	María Teresa es una agricultora que ha sacado adelante a su familia con la siembra de diferentes cultivos como plátano, yuca y papaya que son los más comunes en la zona y actualmente sigue produciendo,  vive en las cercanías del Volcán Arenal en la Zona Norte de Costa Rica. Hace unos 10 años sembró pimienta y ahora está tomando auge en la zona gracias a la promoción que se está dando por la Cadena Agrícola de Valor. Actualmente trabaja con su compañero, ya que sus hijos son mayores y viven por su cuenta  Estas actividades han brindado el sustento a la familia. Persona humilde y trabajadora desea crecer trabajando en conjunto con Propica (empresa que compra la pimienta)  la siembra de este cultivo. 

	Llego a la zona desde hace más de 15 años obteniendo su parcela en un asentamiento del Instituto de Desarrollo Agrario. Ha criado a su familia y trabajado la agricultura con capital propio, obtenido el sustento de la familia de los diferentes cultivos que se ha dedicado. Ha logrado tener su casa propia y ayudado a sus hijos a conseguirla dentro de su parcela.

	 Cuenta en este momento con una siembra de papaya y plátanos  que esta dándole los ingresos semanales. La atención del producto la realiza su familia. Dentro del proyecto de pimienta se está motivando a agricultores de diferentes lugares de la zona norte para que siembren esta planta. Ella ya había cultivado este producto en años anteriores. Desea retomarlo y así contar con un ingreso fijo que le ayude a desarrollar más agricultura para el crecimiento de su familia.



	 Agricultora con experiencia, cuenta con su propio terreno y un negocio estable. Desea incursionar en la pimienta, producto que cultivo hace 10 años, cuenta con el apoyo técnico de Propica y se va a firmar un contrato para la compra de la  cosecha.
texts.en:
Maria Teresa is a farmer who works very hard to support her family. She cultivates plantain, yucca and papaya plants, which are the most heavily consumed staples in the region. She lives near the Arenal Volcano in the northern zone of Costa Rica, and began planting pepper plants 10 years ago. Her crops are doing very well, thanks to support from a local agriculture initiative program. Maria Teresa works with her partner, and their children are now grown and live on their own. Her farming and hard work have helped support her family, and she is a very humble, hardworking person who wants to grow her operation with Propica (the company that purchases her peppers and crops). 

Fifteen years ago Maria Teresa came to the region, and received a parcel of land in a settlement with the Agrarian Development Institute. She has raised a family and farmed her land through much effort and hard work, and her family has lived off the income she has made selling her crops. She has her own house, and has worked to support her children in their pursuits.

Presently, she is growing papaya and plantain crops, and is living off money from the sale of her produce. The local agriculture program Maria is a part of is encouraging farmers in the northern region to plant pepper crops, a crop that Maria used to cultivate several years ago. She wants to get back into growing peppers, and hopes this will help her generate additional income and increase her farming operation to better support her family.

As a farmer with much experience, Maria Teresa has her own land and a stable business. She wants to venture into planting peppers, a crop that she grew a decade ago, and she hopes to sign a contract with Propica for the purchase of her produce.

loans.use: to purchase pepper plants and other input items.

loans.name: Fotima

texts.ru:
Фотима родилась 1982 году в Истаравшане. Она разведена. Живет вместе с родителями. Отец Фотимы работает в России, а мать домохозяйка. 
Фотима занимается животноводством. Она зарабатывает путем разведения крупнорогатого скота. Этим видом деятельности Фотима занимается пять лет. Она берет кредит для закупа несколько голов бычков и коров.
texts.en: Fotima was born in 1982 in the city of Istaravshan.  She is divorced and lives together with her parents.  Fotima's father works in Russia, and her mother is a homemaker.  Fotima is involved in animal husbandry.  She earns a living by breeding cattle.  She has been involved in this business for five years.  Fotima is requesting this loan to buy several bulls and cows.

loans.use: to buy several bulls and cows

loans.name: Ofiyat

texts.ru: Офият 37-летняя жительница города Истаравшан. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Ее муж находится на заработках за рубежом. Сама Офият два года как занимается скотоводством. Она в основном занимается купле – продажей крупнорогатого скота. Кредит берет для закупа телят с целью увеличения поголовья скота.
texts.en: Ofiyat is a 37 year-old resident of the city of Istaravshan.  She is married and has three children.  Her husband works abroad.  Ofiyat has been involved in animal husbandry for two years.  She is primarily involved in buying and selling of cattle.  She is requesting this loan to buy calves in order to increase the livestock headcount.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Imelda

texts.es: Imelda de la localidad de leon, de 76 años soltera , tiene por actividad la venta de ropa usada  desde hace 7 años que se dedica a dicha actividad , ya que ha pesar de su edad, ella quiere ser independiente economicamente y tener un medio de vida, el la actualidad imelda ha podido sacar adelante a su negocio gracia a su esfuerzo, responsabilidad,  y el apoyo que fundacion leon 2000 y kiva le brindan  y seguir trabanjado dia a dia. Del financiamiento comprara ropa de paca de niños y adultos,
texts.en: Imelda, who is from Leon, is a 76 year old single woman. She has had a business selling used clothing for 7 years because, despite her age, she wants to be economically independent and have a means of livelihood. Currently she has been able to move her business ahead thanks to her hard work, sense of responsibility and the support given her by Leon 2000 and Kiva so that she can continue working, day after day. She will use the funding to purchase clothing in bulk for children and adults.

loans.use: to purchase clothing in bulk for children and adults.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
Nuestra socia pertenece al banco comunal “Tercer Milenio” de la Provincia de Urubamba del Cusco – Perú. Nuestra socia se sigue dedicando a la docencia de educación inicial en un colegio de su provincia, actividad que viene realizando hace algún tiempo y que le permite desarrollarse académicamente. la socia  en alguna oportunidad se dedicó a otras actividades complementarias que le permitían aumentar sus ingresos económicos, pero es conciente que solo estudiando y capacitándose podrá sobresalir en su actividad, por ello esta oportunidad invertirá el préstamo para pagar un pos grado de  la carrera profesional que ella estudió que es la Educación.
Nuestra socia está muy agradecida con KIVA por permitirle desarrollarse profesionalmente para tener un futuro y eventualmente realizar sus objetivos académicos tan anhelados.
texts.en:
Our member belongs to the "Tercer Milenio" ("Third Millennium") communal bank from the province of Urubamba in the Cusco region of Peru. Our member continues teaching early childhood education in a school in her province, an activity that she has been doing for some time, and which permits her to develop academically. At one time the member engaged in other supplementary activities that would let her increase her income, but she is aware that only by studying and becoming qualified will she be able to succeed in her work. That is why this time she will use the loan to pay for a graduate degree in the professional career for which she studied, which is education.

Our member is very grateful to Kiva for letting her develop professionally in order to have a future and eventually realize her much-desired academic goals.

loans.use: to pay for a graduate degree

loans.name: Abror

texts.ru: Аброр проживает в городе Истаравшан. Ему 53 года. Он женат. У него один ребенок. Его дочь учится в средней школе. Аброр вместе с женой предоставляет услугу. Он арендует помещение на центральном рынке, где открыл небольшую закусочную. Аброр берет кредит для покупки продуктов и угля.
texts.en: Abror lives in the city of Istaravshan.  He is 53 years old, married and has one child.  His daughter attends a secondary school.  Abror and his wife provide a service.  They lease a space at the central market, where they opened a small cafe.  Abror is requesting this loan to buy products and coal.

loans.use: to purchase flour, oil, potatoes and coal

loans.name: Monica

texts.en: Monica sells small dried fish, called omena, to earn a living. She had previously acquired a loan of 20,000 Kenya shillings (KES) from Faulu Kenya. This helped her to add stock to her business. She dreams of expanding her business and buying a truck for easy transportation of her goods. She needs a loan of 40,000 KES to add more stock of omena.

loans.use: to add stock of small dried fish, called omena.

loans.name: Adelaide Félicité

texts.fr: Félicité est une femme de 46 ans célibataire sans enfants. Elle a ouvert et gère un bar dans un quartier de la capitale depuis 9 ans déjà. son bar fonctionne, elle a un bon emplacement mais manque de stock de marchandises parce que son capital ne lui permet de beaucoup diversifier les gout de boisson d'où l'insatisfaction de certains de ses clients qui sont obligés d'aller consommés chez ses concurrents. Elle sollicite donc ce crédit pour pouvoir augmenter les casiers de boisson et les diversifier. Celà satisfera sa clientèle, augmentera ses ventes et donc ses bénéfices. Elle réinvestira ses bénéfices dans son activité pour l'agrandir, parce qu'elle aimerait ouvrir un restaurant.
texts.en:
Félicité is a 46-year-old woman, who is single and has no children. She opened a bar which she currently manages in a neighborhood of the capital nine years ago. Her bar does well and is well-located. However, she lacks stock as her capital does not allow her to diversify the flavors of her drinks. Consequently, some of her customers are not satisfied, and as a result they frequent her competitors’ establishments. 

Félicité has requested her loan to increase the number of crates of drinks she buys, and also to diversify these products. This will satisfy her customers, increase her sales and, as a result, improve her profits. She plans to reinvest her profits in expanding her business, as she would like to open a restaurant.

loans.use: To buy more crates of drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, detergent, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Radilla

texts.en:
Radilla is from Carmen Annex, Ozamiz City, Philippines. She is 34 years old and married. Radilla has three grown dependents. She  owns and operates a small retail store at home to support her daily needs. For three years, she has been able to manage the store smoothly. Every month she receives PHP 7000 from her business activity. Her third cycle loan is of great help and will allow her to increase her merchandise to sell and increase her return.

Radilla is aiming to expand her business activity. To overcome her tough financial experiences, Radilla   joined GDMPC to have the chance to access financial services. 

This is her fourth loan. She is requesting the amount of PHP 10,000. 

This will be used to purchase daily use goods to sell such as eggs, noodles, canned goods, spices, shampoo and more. With the probable revenue to be gained, Radilla hopes to sustain further their livelihood and sell more products to increase the regular monthly income she receives.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand her product offering.

location.town: Carmen Annex, Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Deysi Beatriz

texts.es:
Nuestra socia  es la señora Deysi, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Tercer Milenio” de la Provincia de Urubamba del Cusco – Perú. Nuestra socia se sigue dedicando al comercio de productos de primera necesidad en su tienda de abarrotes, actividad que viene realizando hace algunos años, y que le permite proporcionar una mejor educación a su menor hija la cual está en edad escolar. Deysi  sabe que ofreciendo y surtiendo su negocio, ella podrá diferenciarse de la enorme competencia que existe en este rubro, por ello esta oportunidad invertirá el préstamo para capitalizar su tienda y comprar mercadería como alimentos pre cocidos y congelados para variar su oferta.
Deysi está muy agradecida con KIVA por permitirle ofrecer una mejor educación a su hija y por ayudarla a surtir y desarrollarse en su comercio.
texts.en:
Our member is Deysi. She belongs to the "Tercer Milenio" ("Third Millennium") communal bank from the province of Urubamba in the Cusco region of Peru. Our member continues to sell staple goods in her grocery store, which she has been doing for some years. It lets her give her youngest daughter, who is school-aged, a better education. Deysi knows that by offering and stocking her store she will be able to differentiate herself from the enormous competition that exists in this line of work. That is why this time she will use the loan to capitalize her business and buy merchandise such as pre-cooked and frozen food in order to vary what she offers.

Deysi is very grateful to Kiva for letting her offer her daughter a better education and for helping her stock her store and develop her business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as pre-cooked and frozen food

loans.name: Glenn

texts.en:
Glenn is 26 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married and has 1 child. 

Glenn owns a sari sari store manage by his wife and he also owns a motorcycle used to transport passengers in their village. He has had this business for 5 years. He requested a loan for PHP 5,000 to buy more stock for the store like shampoos, soap, milk and more snacks to sell and at the same time to pay for the maintenance of his motorcycle, like changing engine oil, motor parts and gasoline consumption.

Glenn has been a member of HSPFI since 2012.  In the future, Glenn hopes to improve his business store and transport services so that they can earn more income to provide food and education of his child.

loans.use: To buy more goods shampoos, soap, milk and more snacks to sell and for the maintenance of his motorcycle.

loans.name: Corina

texts.es:
Corina quiere quitar el barandal que tiene para construir uno mas alto para la protección de su hogar y para ello a invertido esfuerzo pero aun con eso no ha sido suficiente.Con el que tiene aun corre un riego ya que es facil de penetrar y entrar a la vivienda y la inseguridad esta a toda hora del dia.
 Es casada y tiene un hijo y vive con ella, Corina es maestra de ingles al igual que su esposo quien le apoya con los gatos de la casa, poco a poco quieren tener un patrimonio seguro para ellos.
texts.en: Corina wants to remove the railing so she can construct a higher one for the protection of her home. To do this she has invested much effort, but it has not been enough. She is running a risk as it is easy to penetrate and enter the property and the insecurity exists at all hours of the day. She is married and has a son that lives with her. Corina is an English teach as is her husband who helps her with the household expenses. Little by little they want to have a safer property.

loans.use: to do railing construction.

loans.name: Tirus

texts.en:
Tirus is 49 years old. She is married to Kaburi and together they have two children. She operates a grocery store and has been in the business for the past 7 years.

This is Tirus's first term loan with KADET LTD. She was introduced to KADET by one of our credit officers. She will use the loan amount to purchase stock of fruits and vegetables to sell in her business.

Tirus hopes to get a permanent place where she can do her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of fruits and vegetables to sell in her business.

loans.name: Fredy

texts.es:
El socio Fredy pertenece al banco Comunal “Virgen Del Carmen De Huambutio” de la Asociación Arariwa y le va muy bien gracias a pagos puntuales de sus cuotas, él trabaja en una entidad pública pero en sus horas libres se dedica a las elaborar estructuras metálicas como por ejemplo sillas, mesas, ventanas y otras cosas más, él esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como soldadura, pintura y otras cosas más. 

El socio agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Fredy belongs to the "Virgen del Carmen de Huambutio" communal bank of Asociación Arariwa. It is going very well for him thanks to his punctual loan repayments. He works for a public organization, but in his free time he builds metal structures such as chairs, tables, windows, and other items. This time he needs the loan in order to buy work materials such as solder, paint, and other items. 

He is thankful for the loan and he promises to make his repayments on schedule.

loans.use: to buy work materials such as solder, paint, and other items

loans.name: Percy Wilian

texts.es: El socio Percy tiene 21 años y vive en la ciudad de Huambutio, él pertenece al banco Comunal “Virgen Del Carmen De Huambutio” de la Asociación Arariwa y le va muy bien gracias a pagos puntuales de sus cuotas, él trabaja en una entidad pública pero en sus horas libres se dedica a la construcción de casas y obras, él esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como cemento, maderas y otras cosas más. El socio agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en: Percy, 21, lives in the city of Huambutio.  He’s a member of Asociación Arariwa’s “Virgen Del Carmen De Huambutio” communal bank and he does very well thanks to the prompt payment of his installments.  He works for a public institution but in his free time works building houses and on other construction jobs.  On this occasion he needs the loan to buy work supplies like cement, wood and other things.  He is grateful for the loan and commits to make his installment payments as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy work supplies like cement, wood and others.

loans.name: Yvoty Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres de nombre Yvoty está en su octavo ciclo del programa de mujeres emprendedoras de la fundación paraguaya, es un grupo que se destaca por la unión de todas las miembros.
Una historia muy conmovedora  es la de la Sr. Daniela quien se dedica a la confección y venta de sabanas y colchas, nos comenta que mediante el  la ayuda de su grupo pudo mejorar bastante su actividad y su administración gracias a las capacitaciones que recibe.
